#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int foo(int x)
{
	int ret = 0;
	while(x != 0)
	{
		ret = ret + (x & 1);
		x = x/2;
	}
	return ret;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,ans = 0,i;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for (i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ans = ans + foo(i);
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
